translations: 卸货人；履行者；[电] 放电器；开释人

sentences.sentence: Its feed distributor and product dischargers are all of simple structure, easy to control.
sentences.translation: 给矿匀分器和产品截取槽结构简单，控制方便。

sentences.sentence: Some views and concepts in the development of the steel pushers and steel dischargers are mainly presented in this paper, in combination with the author′s view points.
sentences.translation: 连铸坯的断面和长度都加大，由此对加热炉区的附属设备提出了更新的要求，结合作者对推钢机和出钢机的开发和研制过程中的一些观点和想法对此进行了阐述。

sentences.sentence: Section 301's and 304's definitions of BPT, BCT and BAT leave EPA with considerable discretion in establishing effluent limitations for different categories and classes of dischargers.
sentences.translation: 第301条和304条对“最佳实用技术”、常规污染物“最佳控制技术”和“最佳现有技术”所下的定义，使环境保护局在建立污水限制时，要认真区分排污的种类和级别。
